TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit GridSplitter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb
.class public auto ansi GridSplitter extends System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Thumb

summary.span: 表示重新分布 控件的列间距或行间距的控件。

span.span: Represents the control that redistributes space between columns or rows of a control.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 控件在中的行或列之间重新分配空间 ，而不会更改的尺寸 。The control redistributes space between rows or columns in a , without changing the dimensions of the . 例如，当 调整两个列的大小时， 一列的属性会增加，而另一列的 属性将按相同的量减小。For example, when a resizes two columns, the property of one column is increased while at the same time the property of the other column is decreased by the same amount. 下表显示了如何 通过设置 和 属性并 将和属性设置为其默认值，来定义水平或垂直。The following table shows how to define a horizontal or vertical by setting the and properties and by leaving the and properties set to their default values. **如何创建垂直和水平 GridSplitter 控件****How to create vertical and horizontal GridSplitter controls** |GridSplitter 类型GridSplitter type| 值 value| 值 value| |-----------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |调整行的大小Resizes rows||, , , , | |调整列的大小Resizes columns|, , , , || |如果 大于或等于 ，则将调整列的大小。If is greater than or equal to , this resizes the columns.

如果 小于，则会 调整行的大小。If is less than , this resizes the rows.||| 可以与包含其他内容的行或列重叠，也可以单独占用行或列。A can overlap a row or column that contains other content, or it can occupy a row or column by itself. 有关如何定义的详细信息 ，请参阅 [如何：使用 GridSplitter 调整行的大小](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter) 和 [如何：使用 GridSplitter 调整列的大小](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter)。For more information about how to define a , see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter). 如果 和 属性设置未实现所需的 行为，您可以更改 和 属性设置。If the and property settings do not achieve the desired behavior, you can change the and property settings. 可能会被包含在的集合中的其他对象遮住 。A may be obscured by other objects that are contained in the collection of the . 有关如何防止这种情况的信息，请参阅 [如何：确保 GridSplitter 可见](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible)。For information about how to prevent this situation, see [How to: Make Sure That a GridSplitter Is Visible](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-make-sure-that-a-gridsplitter-is-visible). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 通过覆盖列的边缘来定义可调整列大小的 。The following example shows how to define a that resizes columns in a by overlaying the edge of a column. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#gridsplittersimpleexample)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#gridsplittersimpleexample)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#GridSplitterSimpleExample](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#gridsplittersimpleexample)] 下面的示例演示如何定义，以便对中的列进行调整，使其在 中占据列 。The following example shows how to define a that resizes columns in a and that occupies a column in the . [!code-xaml[GridSplitterRowColumn#GridSplitterEntireColumnPart1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterRowColumn/CS/Window1.xaml#gridsplitterentirecolumnpart1)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterRowColumn#GridSplitterEntireColumnPart2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterRowColumn/CS/Window1.xaml#gridsplitterentirecolumnpart2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用户使用 控件调整行或列的大小时必须将鼠标拖动的最小距离。

span.span: Gets or sets the minimum distance that a user must drag a mouse to resize rows or columns with a control.

value.span: 一个值，表示用户在调整行或列的大小时必须使用鼠标拖动 的最小距离。

span.span: A value that represents the minimum distance that a user must use the mouse to drag a to resize rows or columns.
The default is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户拖动鼠标时，由定义的最小距离 会不断地重新初始化。The minimum distance that is defined by is reinitialized continually as the user drags the mouse. 例如，当您 按数量拖动时 ，将调整行或列的大小。For example, when you drag the by the amount, the rows or columns are resized. 若要更好地调整行和列的大小，必须拖动 相同的量。To resize the rows and columns more, you must drag the the same amount. 因此，使用鼠标或键盘移动的列和行大小更改 是以的倍数进行的 。Therefore, changes to column and row sizes that are made by using the mouse or the keyboard to move the are made in multiples of the . ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#dragincrement)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#dragincrement)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#DragIncrement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#dragincrement)]

member this.PreviewStyle : System.Windows.Style with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个样式，该样式自定义当 属性设置为 时将显示的 控件预览指示器的外观、效果或其他样式特征。

span.span: Gets or sets the style that customizes the appearance, effects, or other style characteristics for the control preview indicator that is displayed when the property is set to .

value.span: 返回预览指示器的 ，该指示器在您移动 控件时显示可能在 尺寸方面发生的更改。

span.span: Returns the for the preview indicator that shows the potential change in dimensions as you move the control.

value.span: 默认值为当前主题提供的样式。

span.span: The default is the style that the current theme supplies.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置样式时，有一些限制。When you set styles, there are some restrictions. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [样式设置和模板化](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating)。For more information, see [Styling and Templating](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/styling-and-templating). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `ResourceExtension` 以下项之一： `StaticResource` 或 `DynamicResource` 。One of the following: `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅 [XAML 资源](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources)。See [XAML Resources](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources). `StyleResourceKey` 标识所请求的样式的键。The key that identifies the style being requested. 键引用中的现有资源 。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的，但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅 [内联样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates). 使用或的绑定引用 也是可能的，但情况并不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| 当用户拖动控件时，将显示对行或列边界的更改的预览 ，并且 属性设置为 `true` 。A preview of changes to row or column boundaries is displayed while the user drags the control, and the property is set to `true`. 当用户释放鼠标按钮时，将设置列边界和行边界。The column and row boundaries are set when the user releases the mouse button.

summary.span: 获取或设置哪些列或行要相对于 控件针对其进行定义的列或行调整其大小。

span.span: Gets or sets which columns or rows are resized relative to the column or row for which the control is defined.

value.span: 一个枚举值，该值指示哪些列或行由 控件调整大小。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that indicates which columns or rows are resized by this control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定 调整行或列的大小，请设置 和 属性。To specify a that resizes rows or columns, set the and properties. 如果无法通过设置和属性来实现所需的行为 ，请更改 或 默认值。If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the and properties, change the or default values. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：使用 GridSplitter 调整行的大小](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter) 和 [如何：使用 GridSplitter 调整列的大小](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter)。For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件是否重设行或列的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control resizes rows or columns.

value.span: 用于指定是否重设行或列大小的枚举值之一。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to resize rows or columns.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定 调整行或列的大小，请设置 和 属性。To specify a that resizes rows or columns, set the and properties. 如果无法通过设置和属性来实现所需的行为 ，请更改 或 默认值。If you cannot achieve the desired behavior by setting the and properties, change the or default values. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：使用 GridSplitter 调整行的大小](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter) 和 [如何：使用 GridSplitter 调整列的大小](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter)。For more information, see [How to: Resize Rows with a GridSplitter](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-rows-with-a-gridsplitter) and [How to: Resize Columns with a GridSplitter](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-resize-columns-with-a-gridsplitter). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#ResizeDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#resizedirection)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#ResizeDirection](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#resizedirection)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#ResizeDirection](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#resizedirection)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShowsPreview { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.ShowsPreview : bool with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当用户拖动 控件时该控件是否更新列或行的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the control updates the column or row size as the user drags the control.

value.span: 如果显示 预览，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if a preview is displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 要求对象在 其父树中存在，以便显示拖动预览反馈。A requires an object to be present in its parent tree in order to display drag preview feedback. 此要求通常由在对象创建的对象的 默认样式中使用的对象满足 。This requirement is typically met by the object that is available in the default style for the or in the object that is created by a object. 但是，如果这两个均不可用，则 控件必须定义其自己的 对象。However, if neither of these is available, the control must define its own object. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，将显示行或列大小更改的预览。When the property is set to `true`, a preview of the change in the row or column sizes is shown. 释放时，实际大小会发生变化 。The actual size changes when the is released. 如果将属性设置为 `false` ，则在用户拖动控件时，将实时更新列或行的大小 。If the property is set to `false`, the column or row sizes are updated in real time as the user drags the control. 如果使用键盘移动 控件，则即使将属性设置为，也会实时更新列或行的大小 `true` 。If the keyboard is used to move the control, column or row sizes are updated in real time even if the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property. [!code-csharp[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#showspreview)] [!code-vb[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#showspreview)] [!code-xaml[GridSplitterSnips#ShowsPreview](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/GridSplitterSnips/CSharp/Window1.xaml#showspreview)]
